course_description: After a 5-week overview of strategies and styles in two-party and three-party negotiations and mediations, this seminar will look at complex multiparty international negotiations, including but not limited to: selected issues in Middle East Peace, the civil war in Syria, conflict resolution in South Sudan, and the territorial dispute between Bolivia, Chile, and Peru.
sections: Class Nbr: 2226, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 12:45-3:45p, Instructor: R. Liwanga, Status: Open
